snippet: Total consumer debt stood at $11.15 trillion in the second quarter, down 0.7 percent from the previous quarter, the New York Fed said.
abstract: Federal Reserve Bank of New York reports total consumer debt stood at $11.15 trillion in the second quarter, down 0.7 percent from the previous quarter.
lead_paragraph: Total consumer debt stood at $11.15 trillion in the second quarter, down 0.7 percent from the previous quarter, the New York Fed said.

headline.main: Consumer Debt in U.S. Fell by 0.7% Last Quarter
headline.print_headline: Consumer Debt in U.S. Fell by 0.7% Last Quarter
